annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, thanks to Luxardo and Anchor Distilling I am making a Singapore Sling. This gin flavored drink was developed by a Hainanese ...
annotations.title: Singapore Sling | How to Drink

annotations.description: In this video I'm doing the Singapore Sling recipe I learned when I first began bartending and it is delicious. Now I know there are many other variations an...
annotations.title: Tiki Cocktail: Singapore Sling

textContent:
1.5oz or 45ml Gin
1oz or 30ml Cointreau
.25oz or 15ml Benedictine
1oz or 30ml Pineapple Juice
.75oz or 20ml Lime Juice
Drizzle Cherry Heering
Top Soda water
Luxardo Cherry Garnish

Shake and pour into large glass
Top with crushed ice, soda water, and drizzle of cherry heering
Garnish with cherry

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6hSdTf8rGPg

---

2 oz or 45ml Gin
.5 oz lemon juice
.25oz or 15ml Benedictine
. 5 oz or 30ml Pineapple Juice
.5 oz cherry heering 
Top Soda water
Luxardo Cherry Garnish

Shake and pour into large glass. 
Top with crushed ice. 
Top with soda water and a drizzle of cherry heering (optional)
Garnish with cherry

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8PYtE8wF6pA
title: Singapore Sling
